channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitrix -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bitrix -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-20122|2024-08-05T21:45:25.995Z -- bitrix -- site%20manager
item.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in Bitrix Site Manager 12.06.2015. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the component Contact Form. The manipulation of the argument text with the input leads to basic cross site scripting. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
